reviews.text: This is a small new hotel just a few meters from the cathedral of Santiago de Compostela. Located in a beautiful old street, it offers a quiet environment and a great price. The bedrooms are clean and cozy. The only problem is that there is no parking space.
reviews.title: Great value, wonderful location

reviews.text: I was absolutely delighted with this hotel. I booked a single room and it was quite spacious and clean, with basic but modern furniture and a nice bathroom. The heater is quite efficient (where you can set the temperature). It is located in a quiet street just off the Cathedral. Staff was very helpful and polite. My only complaint would be about the wifi not working very well in my room, but that's it. Good value for money!!!
reviews.title: One of the best budget hotels in Spain
